title: A bug with the Lunar Revel shop :/
body:
I had opened up the Lunar Revel shop yesterday to see five skins, two of which I thought of getting, Royal Guard Fiora (decided against it) and Pool Party Graves. I decided to sit on it for a day, and I logged in today after decided I really wanted to get the Graves skin. Sadly, when I logged in, the two tiles for them had been reset. I sorta panicked when I saw that, and when I opened them back up, I got a Fiora and Graves skin in the same spots I had before, but it was Nightraven Fiora and Mafia Graves. Is there any chance of me getting that half priced Poolparty Graves without having to wait for it to go on sale sometime? D:

tl;dr: Skins changed in the Lunar Revel, and I want one that was there yesterday.

replies.body:
Hey!

The skins that are being replaced in your Lunar Revel Shop are scheduled to go on sale either in January or February. We don't want you to get a Lunar Revel sale only to see it in a regular sale over the next few days, so we have replaced those sales in the Lunar Revel Shop with different offers.

For reference, here are [the sales for February](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/february-sales-schedule).
Thanks, Khaos! I'm glad that it wasn't a bug and that it was something that was intended for the better side of players :) And thanks for the reply!
